Name: Aunt Agatha
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rum and fruit juices with dashes of aromatic bitters. Aunt Agatha likes simple things done well.
History: Aunt Agatha was Bertie Wooster's terrifying aunt in P.G. Wodehouse's books. Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide, Revised .
Nutrition: One serving of Aunt Agatha contains 122 calories
